name: function-builder

packages.name: integration-patterns-skill

packages.name: sync-builder-skill

packages.name: action-builder-skill

packages.name: build-function
packages.description: Complete TDD workflow for building Nango functions (actions or syncs) - accepts optional action|sync argument, generates code, creates tests, and validates
